text: Franco Modigliani (18 June 1918 - 25 September 2003) was an Italian-American economist. He won the 1985 Nobel Memorial Prize in Economics. He was a professor at University of Illinois at Urbanaâ€“Champaign, Carnegie Mellon University, and MIT Sloan School of Management. ==References== Category:1918 births Category:2003 deaths Category:Italian economists Category:American economists Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States Category:People from Rome
